fulltext: oai:www.clarin.si:11356/1209;2019-01-05T09:05:24Z;hdl_11356_1023;hdl_11356_1024;Croatian parliamentary corpus ParlaMeter-hr 1.0;Dobranić, Filip;Ljubešić, Nikola;Erjavec, Tomaž;Croatian Parliament;parliamentary debates;TEI;named entities;The ParlaMeter-hr corpus contains minutes of the National Assembly of the Republic of Croatia and currently covers its VIth mandate (2016-11-15 - 2018-11-21). The corpus contains speaker metadata (gender, age, education, party affiliatiation), while the transcriptions of their speeches are MSD tagged, lemmatised, and marked with named entities.;2019-01-08;corpus;http://hdl.handle.net/11356/1209;hrv;Creative Commons - Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-SA 4.0);https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/;PUB;application/zip;application/zip;text/plain; charset=utf-8;downloadable_files_count: 2;Jožef Stefan Institute;https://parlametar.hr/
name: f27eb3fd-45ed-5a42-b14f-35c195e43e8f
notes: The ParlaMeter-hr corpus contains minutes of the National Assembly of the Republic of Croatia and currently covers its VIth mandate (2016-11-15 - 2018-11-21). The corpus contains speaker metadata (gender, age, education, party affiliatiation), while the transcriptions of their speeches are MSD tagged, lemmatised, and marked with named entities.
title: Croatian parliamentary corpus ParlaMeter-hr 1.0
